targets.expr: sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$slo_task_queue", result="success"}[$__range])) /  sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$slo_task_queue"}[$__range]))

sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$slo_task_queue"}[$__range])) /  sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", name=~"$slo_task_queue"}[$__range]))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", status!~"5..", service="tasks", uri=~"$slo_url_task_opus"}[$__range:])) by (namespace) / sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="tasks", uri=~"$slo_url_task_opus"}[$__range:])) by (namespace)

panels.title: Отправка сообщения о смене статуса в Solution
